thread.title: Jamie O'Hara heartbroken after Danielle Lloyd REFUSES to let him see their children
thread.title_full: Jamie O'Hara heartbroken after Danielle Lloyd REFUSES to let him see their children

author: Jennifer Crothers
title: Jamie O'Hara heartbroken after Danielle Lloyd REFUSES to let him see their children
text:
Jamie O'Hara heartbroken after Danielle Lloyd REFUSES to let him see their children The Celebrity Big Brother star has been stopped from seeing his three boys after keys mishap Share Jamie O'Hara has been stopped from seeing his children (Photo: Rex) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Jamie O'Hara has reportedly been stopped from seeing his children by his ex-wife Danielle Lloyd. 
The former couple have three children together: Archie, six, Harry, five, and George, three, but Jamie wasn't allowed to see them after losing his keys. 
It all started when Jamie was at a charity event on Tuesday night for LGBT History Month, and accidentally left his bag and keys in the venue's cloakroom. 
"He thought someone else had grabbed them for him," a source tells Mirror Online. "He was supposed to pick up his kids at 9am the next morning, but without his car keys, he couldn't. And the venue didn't reopen until later in the day." Jamie reportedly isn't allowed to see his children (Photo: Rex Features) Jamie tweeted this picture with his sons following his stint in the Celebrity Big Brother house (Photo: @Mrjamieohara1 /Twitter) Danielle wasn't happy that Jamie wasn't able to pick up their children (Photo: Getty Images Europe) 
"So he emailed Danielle and explained the situation and said he'd be there as soon as he could. He even made plans for someone else to pick up the kids but Danielle refused. 
"She flew off the handle and said he wasn't allowed to see the kids. He's now going to have to go to court to fight to see his children. 
"He's absolutely heartbroken. He'd made plans for his time with the kids, had theme park tickets for them. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
